overview: Michael Morrison is an accomplished executive and entrepreneur successful at managing, building and growing businesses. He has directed and managed all aspects of business development, product development, technology, services, finance and operations in early stage, growth stage, and turn-around companies. Mr. Morrison brings strong experience in business development, capital fund-raising, and Merger & Acquisitions. He has operated in diverse senior management positions at publicly traded and growth stage companies, led start-up and early stage ventures, and advised numerous businesses and investment groups. He is an experienced technologist with almost 20 years of experience leading Software as a Service (SaaS), Internet, Communications, and Enterprise Software Development companies.
